texto: define the stakeholder requirements for a system that can provide the capabilities needed by users and other stakeholders in a defined environment. It identifies stakeholders, or stakeholder classes, involved with the system throughout its life cycle, and their needs. It analyzes and transforms these needs into a common set of stakeholder requirements that express the intended interaction the system will have with its operational environment and that are the reference against which each resulting operational capability is validated. The stakeholder requirements are defined considering the context of the system‐of‐interest with the interoperating systems and enabling systems. NOTE The SWEBOK,
